parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.query:
Resources 
| where type =~ "microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces" 
| order by name 
| project id, name, selected=row_number()==1, group=resourceGroup
parameters.label: ðŸ—‚ï¸ Workspace

parameters.name: Top
parameters.label: Show Top locations
parameters.description: Only show this amount of locations om the map

content.query:
OnePasswordEventLogs_CL
| summarize count() by bin (timestamp, 1d), log_source

OnePasswordEventLogs_CL
| where log_source contains "signinattempts"
| extend city_  = tostring(location.city) 
| extend state_ = tostring(location.state) 
| extend countryOrRegion_ =  tostring((geo_info_from_ip_address (tostring(client.ip_address))).region)
| extend latitude_  = tostring(location.latitude)
| extend longitude_ = tostring(location.longitude) 
| order by timestamp asc, city_ asc
| serialize 
| extend pLat = prev(latitude_, 1)
| extend pLon = prev(longitude_, 1)
| extend distanceType = iif('{Measurement}' == "KM", todouble(1000), todouble(1609.344))
| extend distance_in = iif(row_number() > 1,tostring(round(geo_distance_2points(todouble(longitude_), todouble(latitude_), todouble(pLon), todouble(pLat))/distanceType ,2)),"FirstLocation")
| where distance_in !="0.0"
| summarize by bin(timestamp, {TimeRange:grain}),
                       City=city_ ,
                       CountryorRegion=countryOrRegion_, 
                       visitedInThisOrder = row_number(),
                       distanceTravelled = distance_in,
                       distanceTravelled2 = strcat(distance_in,' ','{Measurement}'),
                       latitude_,
                       longitude_
| order by timestamp asc, visitedInThisOrder asc
content.title: User Locations
User Sign-ins

content.query:
OnePasswordEventLogs_CL
| where log_source contains "signinattempts"
| extend countryOrRegion_ =  tostring((geo_info_from_ip_address (tostring(client.ip_address))).country)
| order by TimeGenerated asc
| summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}),
                       Country=countryOrRegion_ 
| order by count_ desc

OnePasswordEventLogs_CL
| where log_source contains "signinattempts"
| distinct tostring(target_user.name)
| count
content.title: Active Users

content.query:
OnePasswordEventLogs_CL
| where object_type == "group"
| where action == "create"
| count
content.title: Groups Added

content.query:
OnePasswordEventLogs_CL
| where object_type == "group"
| where action == "delete"
| count
content.title: Groups deleted

content.query:
OnePasswordEventLogs_CL
| where log_source contains "signinattempts"
//| where category != "success"
| extend actiontype_ = tostring(action_type)
| order by TimeGenerated asc, category asc
| summarize count() by Category=category 
| order by count_ desc

OnePasswordEventLogs_CL
| where log_source contains "signinattempts"
| extend applicationName_ = tostring(client.app_name)
| where applicationName_ notcontains "SCIM"
| order by timestamp asc , applicationName_
| summarize count() by bin(timestamp, {TimeRange:grain}),
                       ApplicationName=applicationName_ 
| order by count_ desc
content.title: All Users : Used Application by most frequent

items.name: query - 6 - by Location  - All User - Copy - Copy

parameters.name: Select
parameters.label: Select Users method

parameters.name: SelectUserName
parameters.query:
OnePasswordEventLogs_CL
| extend UserDisplayName = tostring(target_user.name)
| where timestamp  {TimeRange:query}
| where isnotempty(UserDisplayName) and  UserDisplayName !="On-Premises Directory Synchronization Service Account"
| summarize Count = count() by UserDisplayName
| order by Count desc, UserDisplayName asc
| project Value = UserDisplayName, Label = strcat(UserDisplayName, ' - ', Count, ' sign-ins'), Selected = false

parameters.name: userCount
parameters.label: How many unique Users?
parameters.query:
OnePasswordEventLogs_CL
| extend UserDisplayName = tostring(target_user.name)
| where isnotempty(UserDisplayName) and  UserDisplayName !="On-Premises Directory Synchronization Service Account"
| distinct UserDisplayName
| summarize Count = strcat(count()," of 1000")

parameters.name: UserFilter
parameters.query:
OnePasswordEventLogs_CL
| extend UserDisplayName = tostring(target_user.name)
| distinct UserDisplayName
| project  Alpha = toupper(substring(UserDisplayName,0,1))
| summarize Count = count() by Alpha
| order by Alpha asc
| project Value=Alpha, Label=Alpha, selected = false

parameters.name: SelectUserLetter
parameters.label: Select User Letter
parameters.query:
OnePasswordEventLogs_CL
| extend UserDisplayName = tostring(target_user.name)
| where UserDisplayName startswith '{UserFilter:label}'
| summarize by UserDisplayName
| order by UserDisplayName asc

parameters.name: selectedUserCount
parameters.label: How many unique Users?
parameters.query:
SigninLogs
| where UserDisplayName startswith '{UserFilter:label}'
| distinct UserDisplayName
| summarize Count = strcat(count()," of 1000")

parameters.name: SelectUserFree
parameters.label: Search for a User here
parameters.description: Enter a free text search for a User Name

parameters.name: SelectUserwithin
parameters.label: Matched User(s)
parameters.query:
OnePasswordEventLogs_CL
| extend UserDisplayName = tostring(target_user.name)
| where UserDisplayName contains '{SelectUserFree}'
| distinct UserDisplayName
| project UserDisplayName 
| order by UserDisplayName asc

parameters.name: selectedUserCount2
parameters.label: How many unique Users?
parameters.query:
OnePasswordEventLogs_CL
| extend UserDisplayName = tostring(target_user.name)
| where UserDisplayName contains '{SelectUserFree}'
| distinct UserDisplayName
| summarize Count = strcat(count()," of 1000")

parameters.name: SelectUser
parameters.description: Only shows user from name or letter parameter - depending on Toggle
parameters.query:
OnePasswordEventLogs_CL
| extend SelectUser = case( '{Select}' == "name"   , '{SelectUserName}',
                            '{Select}' == "letter" , '{SelectUserLetter}',
                            '{Select}' == "free"   , '{SelectUserwithin}',
                            // else
                            "error"
                            )
| limit 1
| project SelectUser

content.json:
### Missing Input data Warning: diagnostics

User Name displayed, from the selected parameter: 
## {SelectUser}

|Parameter|Value detected|
|---|---|
|Name|{SelectUserName}|
|Letter|{SelectUserLetter}|
|Free|{SelectUserFree}|

content.query:
OnePasswordEventLogs_CL
| where log_source contains "signinattempts"
| extend UserDisplayName = tostring(target_user.name)
| where UserDisplayName == '{SelectUser}'
| extend city_  = tostring(location.city) 
| extend state_ = tostring(location.state) 
| extend countryOrRegion_ = tostring(location.region) 
| extend latitude_  = tostring(location.latitude)
| extend longitude_ = tostring(location.longitude) 
| order by TimeGenerated asc, city_ asc
| serialize 
| extend pLat = prev(latitude_, 1)
| extend pLon = prev(longitude_, 1)
| extend distanceType = iif('{Measurement}' == "KM", todouble(1000), todouble(1609.344))
| extend distance_in = iif(row_number() > 0,tostring(round(geo_distance_2points(todouble(longitude_), todouble(latitude_), todouble(pLon), todouble(pLat))/distanceType, 2)), "FirstLocation")
| where distance_in !="0.0"
| summarize by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}),
                       UserDisplayName,
                       City=city_ ,
                       CountryorRegion=countryOrRegion_, 
                       visitedInThisOrder = row_number(),
                       distanceTravelled = distance_in,
                       distanceTravelled2 = strcat(distance_in,' ','{Measurement}'),
                       latitude_,
                       longitude_
| order by TimeGenerated asc, visitedInThisOrder asc
content.title: Map showing locations for user: '{SelectUser}'

content.query:
extend a = parse_json('{SelectedUsers}')
| project  ['User']='{SelectUser}', ['city']=a.regionName, ['latitude']=a.latitude, ['longitude']=a.longitude
| limit 1
content.title: Please select a map region for more details
'{SelectUser}': Sign-in pattern

content.query:
OnePasswordEventLogs_CL
| where log_source contains "signinattempts"
| where target_user.name == '{SelectUser}'
| extend city_  = tostring(location.city) 
| extend state_ = tostring(location.state) 
| extend countryOrRegion_ = tostring(location.region) 
| extend latitude_  = tostring(location.latitude)
| extend longitude_ = tostring(location.longitude)
| order by TimeGenerated asc , city_ asc
| serialize 
| extend pLat = prev(latitude_,1)
| extend pLon = prev(longitude_,1)
| extend distanceType = iif('{Measurement}' == "KM", todouble(1000), todouble(1609.344))
| extend distance_in = iif(row_number() > 1,tostring(round(geo_distance_2points(todouble(longitude_), todouble(latitude_), todouble(pLon), todouble(pLat))/distanceType ,2)),strcat("FirstLocation",' ','({Measurement})') ) 
| extend dwell_in = datetime_diff("second",TimeGenerated, prev(TimeGenerated))
| where distance_in !="0.0"
| extend
    UserDisplayName = tostring(target_user.name)
    , City = city_
    , State = state_
    , location = location.country
    , IPAddress = tostring(client.ip_address)
    , ClientAppUsed = tostring(client.app_version)
    , AppDisplayName = tostring(client.app_name)
| extend ResourceGroup = 'Microsoft.aadiam'
| summarize by TimeGenerated,
                       UserDisplayName,
                       City=city_ ,
                       State = state_,
                       Location=countryOrRegion_, 
                       visitOrder = row_number(),
                       distanceBetweenLocations = distance_in, // strcat(distance_in,' ','({Measurement})')
                       dwell_in, IPAddress, ResourceGroup, AppDisplayName, ClientAppUsed
| order by TimeGenerated asc, visitOrder asc
content.title: Looking for '{SelectUser}' - click a row for more IP detail

content.query: {"version":"ARMEndpoint/1.0","data":null,"method":"GET","path":"/subscriptions/{Workspace:subscriptionid}/resourceGroups/Microsoft.aadiam/providers/Microsoft.SecurityInsights/enrichment/ip/geodata/?ipaddress={ipAddress}&api-version=2021-09-01-preview","batchDisabled":false,"transformers":[{"type":"jsonpath","settings":{"tablePath":"$"}}]}
content.title: ðŸ–§ Lookup IP Address: {ipAddress} from Microsoft geoLocation api

content.query:
let IP_Data = external_data(network:string,geoname_id:long,continent_code:string,continent_name:string ,country_iso_code:string,country_name:string,is_anonymous_proxy:bool,is_satellite_provider:bool)
    ['https://raw.githubusercontent.com/datasets/geoip2-ipv4/master/data/geoip2-ipv4.csv']
    with (ignoreFirstRecord=true, format="csv");
IP_Data
| evaluate ipv4_lookup(IP_Data, '{ipAddress}', network)
| summarize arg_max(network,*) by '{ipAddress}'
| extend IPaddress = '{ipAddress}'
| project-away *1
| project-reorder IPaddress
content.title: ðŸ–§  Lookup IP Address: {ipAddress} from GeoIP2

content.query:
OnePasswordEventLogs_CL
| where log_source contains "signinattempts"
| extend UserDisplayName = tostring(target_user.name)
| where UserDisplayName !="On-Premises Directory Synchronization Service Account"
| where UserDisplayName == '{SelectUser}'
| extend city_  = tostring(location.city) 
| extend state_ = tostring(location.state) 
| extend countryOrRegion_ = tostring(location.region) 
| extend latitude_  = tostring(location.latitude)
| extend longitude_ = tostring(location.longitude)  
| order by TimeGenerated asc , city_ asc
| serialize 
| extend pLat = prev(latitude_,1)
| extend pLon = prev(longitude_,1)
| extend distanceType = iif('{Measurement}' == "KM", todouble(1000), todouble(1609.344))
| extend distance_in = iif(isnotempty(pLat),tostring(round(geo_distance_2points(todouble(longitude_), todouble(latitude_), todouble(pLon), todouble(pLat))/distanceType ,2)),"FirstLocation")
| where distance_in !="0.0"
| summarize by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain}),
                       UserDisplayName,
                       City=city_ ,
                       CountryorRegion=countryOrRegion_, 
                       visitedInThisOrder = row_number(),
                       distanceTravelled = strcat(distance_in,' ','{Measurement}')
//| top {Top} by City
| order by TimeGenerated asc, visitedInThisOrder asc
content.title: '{SelectUser}' : Cities visitied
